title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-5.6 - Appendix: form for adoption notices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-5.6 - Appendix: form for adoption notices

State Regulations
(
Name of Public Utility
)

Adoption Notice No. _____
(
Name of Public Utility
) hereby adopts, ratifies, and makes its own, in every respect, as if the same had been
originally filed by it, the following instruments originally filed with the

Public Service Commission, State of New York, or heretofore adopted by
(
Name of Predecessor
): (Here list all schedules, contracts, concurrences, powers
of attorney, agreements, or other instruments on file with the Commission which
are adopted.)

Date of Issue (
Month, day, year
) Date

Effective (
Month, day, year
)

Issued by (
Name of officer, title, address
)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
720-5.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
